name: Queen Noor Aviation College
about: The Queen Noor Civil Aviation Technical College (QNCATC) is dedicated to providing effective, efficient training and consultancy services in the field of aviation. Our mission is to enhance safety, security, and efficiency in aviation training. Founded on the vision of King Hussein and inspired by the aviation legacy of Queen Noor, the college offers a range of diploma programs tailored to meet the industry's needs. With a focus on technical excellence and practical skills, QNCATC prepares students for successful careers in aviation, ensuring they are equipped with the knowledge and expertise to contribute to the global aviation community. We are committed to fostering a culture of safety, innovation, and excellence in all aspects of aviation training.
services:
["Flight Safety Training
English Language Training
Technical Training
Admin & Finance
ICAO Aviation Language Proficiency Test"]
